overview: Trapped in an ice cave with a stoic lover beneath the House of Empath, The Bedroom Witch one night sees a promising vision of escape offered by the Fourth Sister. This overture, however, comes at a deadly consequence as 'Triptych' follows a story of obsession, murder, and a descent into madness.  "Triptych" is a 19 minute concept film told through three music videos with prose interludes in between.
title: Triptych
